text: Plano is a city in the state of Texas in the United States. It is the ninth largest city in the state. Over 280,000 people live there. It has a humid subtropical climate (Cfa in the Koeppen climate classification). Plano has the headquarters of many large businesses, including: *Frito-Lay *Dell Services, a division of Dell *HP Enterprise Services, a division of Hewlett-Packard *Dr Pepper Snapple Group *Siemens PLM Software, a division of the Siemens group *Ericsson *J. C. Penney *Capital One Financial Services *Pizza Hut == References ==
title: Plano, Texas
